name: Gravity (itch) (Mountain Seal, SWITTER Games)
description: Just press the space bar to change gravity and fly to another platform! Just don't land on the red platforms - they kill! The game has three game modes: company, endless and endless multiplayer (in development, do not report any errors). Also, if you don't like your character, just change the skin, you can get new skins for the time spent in endless mode or for coins.
